name: printFzxSetFontAddr
doc:
sub fastcall printFzxSetFontAddr(addr as Uinteger)

Sets the FZX font address

name: printFzxSetMargin
doc:
sub fastcall printFzxSetMargin(margin as ubyte)

Sets the left margin for FZX printing

name: printFzxAt
parameters: row as Ubyte, col as Ubyte
doc:
sub fastcall printFzxAt(row as Ubyte, col as Ubyte)

Sets the print position for FZX printing

name: printFzxStr
doc:
sub printFzxStr(s as String)

Prints a string using FZX proportional font

name: printFzxChar
doc:

Prints a character using FZX proportional font
